questions.subject: murderer
questions.question: Did the murderer go to the EAST SIDE?

responseText.affirmative: Yes, the murderer went to the EAST side
responseText.negative: No, the murderer went to the WEST side

questions.subject: murderer
questions.question: What part of town did the murderer go to?

questions.subject: murderer
questions.question: Did the murderer go to the Art Show, Box at the Theatre, or the Card Party?
questions.responseText: `${response} ? `Yes, they went to one of those`:`No, they didn't go to any of those``

questions.subject: suspect
questions.question: Were you on the EAST SIDE?

responseText.affirmative: Yes, I was on the EAST side
responseText.negative: No, I was on the WEST side

questions.subject: suspect
questions.question: Which part of town were you in?

questions.subject: suspect
questions.question: Were you at the Art Show, the Box at the Theatre, or the Card Party?
questions.responseText: `${response} ? `Yes, I was at one of those`:`No, I don't hang out at those places``

questions.subject: suspect
questions.question: Were you where a weapon was hidden?

questions.subject: murderer
questions.question: Are an odd-numbered suspect's prints on the .38?
questions.responseText: `${response===undefined} ? `I didn't see a gun`:`${response} ? `Yes, they were from an odd-numbered suspect`:`No, they were from an even-numbered suspect```

questions.subject: murderer
questions.question: Are an odd-numbered suspect's prints on the .45?
questions.responseText: `${response===undefined} ? `I didn't see a gun`:`${response} ? `Yes, they were from an odd-numbered suspect`:`No, they were from an even-numbered suspect```
